<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ml_solution_definition</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="ml_solution_definition">trainer.name=clustering_trainer^EQ<item display_value="Clustering" endquery="false" field="trainer.name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="clustering_trainer"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Clustering - Validate Fields</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var min_records = parseInt(current.min_records); var threshold = parseInt(current.threshold); var outputErrorMessage = ''; if (isNaN(min_records) || (min_records < 2)){ outputErrorMessage = gs.getMessage('Minimum number of records in a cluster should be an integer greater than or equal to 2'); gs.addErrorMessage(outputErrorMessage); return false; } else if (isNaN(threshold) || threshold < 0 || threshold > 100) { outputErrorMessage = gs.getMessage('Target Solution Coverage should be between 0 to 100'); gs.addErrorMessage(outputErrorMessage); return false; }
return true; })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-23 00:04:51</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>19f620a4b74d3300d1dcf8b8ee11a914</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clustering - Validate Fields</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_19f620a4b74d3300d1dcf8b8ee11a914</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-24 11:49:59</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19f620a4b74d3300d1dcf8b8ee11a914"/> </record_update>
